//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 DNEResolution;
//   float4 MinZ_MaxZRatio;
//   float NvStereoEnabled;
//   sampler2D NvStereoFixTexture;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_0;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_1;
//   sampler2D PixelTexture2D_2;
//   sampler2D SceneColorTexture;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   float4 UniformPixelVector_0;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                    Reg   Size
//   ----------------------- ----- ----
//   DNEResolution           c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias c1       1
//   MinZ_MaxZRatio          c2       1
//   NvStereoEnabled         c3       1
//   UniformPixelVector_0    c7       1
//   SceneColorTexture       s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture      s1       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0        s2       1
//   PixelTexture2D_1        s3       1
//   PixelTexture2D_2        s4       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c5, 0.0799999982, 0.200000003, 0, 0
    def c6, 1, 0.25, 0, 2
    dcl_texcoord4 v0
    dcl_texcoord7_pp v1
    dcl_texcoord5 v2.w
    dcl_texcoord v3.xy
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4

// Redundant Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 --disable-redundant-unreal-correction --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --auto-fix-unreal-dne-reflection --only-autofixed --quiet CRC32_A6BD1A2A_904.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

    mad r0.xy, vPos, c0, c0.zwzw
    mul r0.yz, r0.xxyw, v2.w
    texld r1, v3, s2
    mad r1.xz, v3.xyyw, c6.xyyw, c6.zyww
    texld r2, r1.xzzw, s3
    mad r1.x, r1.y, r2.x, r1.y
    mul r1.x, r1.x, v1.w
    abs r1.y, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r2, c4, s1
      add r1.z, -r2.y, v2.w
      mad r0.x, r2.x, r1.z, r0.y
      mov r0.w, v2.w
      mov r2.xyz, r0.xzww
    else
      mov r2.xyz, c6.z
    endif
    mov r0.w, v2.w
    cmp r2.xyz, -r1.y, r0.yzww, r2
    rcp r1.z, r2.z
    mul r1.zw, r1.z, r2.xyxy
    mad r2.xy, r1.zwzw, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r2.zw, c6.z
    texldl r2, r2, s0
    add r1.z, r2.w, -c2.y
    add r1.w, -r1.z, c4.z
    rcp r1.z, r1.z
    cmp r1.z, r1.w, c4.w, r1.z
    mad r1.z, c2.x, r1.z, -v2.w
    mul_sat r1.z, r1.z, c5.x
    mul r1.z, r1.z, r1.x
    texld r2, r1.z, s4
    mad_pp r2.xyz, v1, r2, c7
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r3, c4, s1
      add r1.z, -r3.y, v2.w
      mad r0.x, r3.x, r1.z, r0.y
      mov r3.xyz, r0.xzww
    else
      mov r3.xyz, c6.z
    endif
    cmp r0.xyz, -r1.y, r0.yzww, r3
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c6.z
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    add r0.x, r0.w, -c2.y
    add r0.y, -r0.x, c4.z
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.y, c4.w, r0.x
    mad r0.x, c2.x, r0.x, -v2.w
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.x, c5.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, r1.x
    mul_pp oC0.w, r0.x, c5.y
    mad_pp oC0.xyz, r2, v0.w, v0

// approximately 62 instruction slots used (9 texture, 53 arithmetic)
